# Privacy Policy

Microlink respects your privacy regarding any information we may collect from
you across our website [microlink.io](https://microlink.io), and other sites
we own and operate, according to EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

## Information we collect

**When you visit our website** : Our servers automatically log your computer’s
Internet Protocol (IP) address anonymized, your browser type and version, the
pages you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on each page,
and other standard data provided by your web browser for website analytics
purposes.

**When you choose a paid plan** : We ask for your email address and payment
details, as well as what information you wish to include in your policy.

**When you consume our API** : Similar to data collected for website analytics
purposes, we do the same in our API for detecting errors or improve response
timing.

We retain information for our sales records and to facilitate additional
support after your order is complete.
